channel.title: Vaisakh N V
channel.description: Recent content on Vaisakh N V

item.title: About
item.description:
I am Vaisakh Naduvodi Viswambharan, a Master’s student in Nanoelectronic Systems at TU Dresden, working on digital design, verification, and AI-assisted formal methods.

This site highlights my research, projects, and publications.

item.title: Research
item.description:
Interests

  • Formal verification and assertion-based verification
  • AI-assisted verification workflows
  • Digital IC design and verification methodology

Current focus

  • AI-augmented formal verification (spec → structured IR → properties)
  • Verification knowledge graphs and traceability
